name: Jamping Fish
storyline:
Jump over moving cars and plates.
Avoid the ruthless starfish.
Wouldn't it be easy to avoid multiple cats?
Avoid traps that will piss you off.
You will have to ride the slide very well to clear this game.
Trust your sense of balance. Avoid the ball well.
Good Luck.
summary: All you have to do is control the fish with your keyboard to jump over moving stones, plates, cars and more, and avoid starfish or cats to reach the top of the statue.
